Line: Then why are you still here?
Can you show it to me?
Do you know how to use items?
Then what are you waiting for?
It's simple. When we're done talking, open your inventory with the button I.
Then, select the object with the arrow keys and Z, and close your inventory with I.
With the object still selected, talk to me again to show it to me.
Do you need me to explain again?
